description: This is a market on whether the Kansas City Chiefs will beat the Minnesota Vikings by over 4 points in their NFL preseason matchup scheduled to take place on August 27, 2021. This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Kansas City Chiefs win by over 4 points, and “No” otherwise. If the match is postponed to a date on or before September 27, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a date after September 27, 2021, or canceled altogether, the market will resolve 50-50. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

events.title: Will the Chiefs beat the Vikings by more than 4 points in their NFL preseason matchup?

question: Will the Chiefs beat the Vikings by more than 4 points in their NFL preseason matchup?
